PluginData.Author: Kapitan Oczywisty
PluginData.Tooltip: HudLcd displays the Text of selected LCDs on your HUD
PluginData.Description: HudLcd displays the Text of selected LCDs on your HUD - Display multiple LCDs on your HUD - Configure Position, Fontsize and Colour! - Debug and Monospace font support (thanks to Text HUD API v2) - Support for multi-screen blocks: Cockpits, Programmable Blocks, Medical Rooms etc. - Dropped support of Title in favor of Name - Configuration options changed
